'''Cotta''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The wolf at this man's side raises her hackles and growls. He shushes and pats her behind the ears, all the while keeping his focus trained on you.}}
Cotta is a particularly primitive member of the Principi who wants the shipwright [Zamar](/zamar/) to service Principi ships exclusively. He wants to do it by way of intimidation and slowly throttling Zamar's income, so that he has no recourse but to give in. Although [Serafen](/serafen/) hates Cotta's guts, the deal is sound insofar the short pirate is concerned.

## =Quests

=
* [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/): Cotta and Celezzia, his wolf, are the source of Zamar's problems.
** He will appear in the back alley to the north after talking with [Captain Radora](/captainRadora/) in [The Wild Mare](/theWildMare/).
** If you force Zamar to accept an exclusivity deal with the Principi, Cotta and his will appear in the shipyard from then onwards.

## Trivia

* When approached for the first time, Cotta finishes a sentence: "...so she asked him what he calls that trick, and he says "the consuagli!". Based on the structure, this appears to be a reference to "[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Aristocrats The Aristocrats]".
